thread.title: Challenge: Can You Contain The Urge To Headbang While Listening To These Songs? [News]
thread.title_full: Challenge: Can You Contain The Urge To Headbang While Listening To These Songs? [News]

title: Challenge: Can You Contain The Urge To Headbang While Listening To These Songs? [News]
text: I just masturbated the whole time. 10 @1:20 in the first video that shitty Disturbed cover was amazing hahaha 9 This is one step from torture 6 It's funny because "Bleed" plays at the end of the first one right when it says "Did you pass?" and I immediately lost with that riff. Like instinctual headbang and air guitar. 5 Human371 163 · 6 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply And the only other Meshuggah tune they even bothered with was "Demiurge" which I think is kind of a weaker tune from them. Like, if they had used "Stengah" or "New Millennium Cyanide Christ" or "Do Not Look Down", I'd have been fucked. 1 travislausch [w] 3,584 · 6 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply Totally agree. All three of those tunes would have made me lose, especially if they'd come in when I wasn't ready for them. 0 Not headbanging is easy. Stopping the feet from tapping is another story. 4 It's really difficult! I almost lost it in Psychosocial! :O 3 I don't think it's possible to not headbang to Walk 2 They picked some of the absolute worst breakdowns for this challenge. 1 This always does it for me 1 Katatonia! Always happy to see them popup on here! Personally if Forsaker was the first song id have been completely screwed 0 The first video was too easy. If they played some real metal, i would have failed for sure. I sure as fuck wasn't going to sit through more trendy garbage of the next 2 videos. 1 I lost it at psychosocial 0 They got me with Slipknot. That song gets me every time. Could've used Helmet's Unsung too. 0 Had my guitar in hand when playing the video. They didn't say I can't play along, so I did. Wait, never mind. It says "or any other movement" which means passing is literally impossible. 0
